      #parse("oetinvest/header.vm")

<h2>Test Race:  Pre-race investment screen</h2>

<table><tr><td bgcolor='$!data.voicecolor'><i>Here you can see how the entire pre-race investment screen 
appears. When you click 'Continue', we will explain the elements of this screen in more detail.
</i></i></td></tr></table>
 
<p>You can now choose how much you want to bet on your car and how much to invest 
into the engine.  If your car wins, you will receive <b>$data.winfactor times</b> 
what you have bet; if your car does not
 win and you have not dropped out of the bet during the race, 
then your initial bet is completely forfeited.</p>

<br>

#macro( carinput $col )
<td align='center'>
<input type='radio' name='carcolor' value='$col'>
<br>
<img src='file:oetinvest/media/car_${col}.gif'>
</td>
#end

<p width='80%'>
<table><tr><td>
What colour would you like your car to be?
#if ($error.carcolor) 
<br><font color='#ff0000;'>You have to select a car colour.</font>
#end
<br>
</td>
#carinput( "blue" )
#carinput( "magenta" )
#carinput( "red" )
#carinput( "yellow" )
</tr></table>
</p>

<p>
Choose how much you want to bet and how much you want to invest by selecting a value 
on this sliding scale:
</p>

<table width="100%"><tr>
<td width="10%"></td>
<td width='800px' rowspan='2'>
<lowinvestslider name='bet'  min='0.0' max='$!data.earnings' scale='100' format="#0.00" winfactor="$!data.winfactor"
#if ( $data.newpage != "true" )
    value="$!data.bet" 
#end 
>
#if ($error.bet) 
<br><font color='#ff0000;'>You have to bet something.</font>
#end
</td><td width='10%'></td></tr><tr><td></td></tr>
</table>

<p>Please also tell us your guess of the likelihood of your car winning:</p>

<table width="100%"><tr>
<td width="10%"></td>
<td width='800px' valign='top'>
<slider name='expectation'  min='0' max='1000' scale='1'  label="Out of 1000 races, how often do you think your car would arrive first? ( __ out of 1000 times )"
#if ( $data.newpage != "true" )
    value="$!data.expectation" 
#end 
>
#if ($error.expectation) 
<br><font color='#ff0000;'>You have to make a prediction.</font>
#end

<br>

<slider name='confidence'  min='0' max='100' scale='1'  label="How confident are you that your guess is roughly right? ( __ out of a 100 % )"
#if ( $data.newpage != "true" )
    value="$!data.confidence" 
#end 
>
#if ($error.confidence ) 
<br><font color='#ff0000;'>You have to make a statement here.</font>
#end
</td><td width='10%'></td></tr>
</table>

<p>
#if ( "$data.newpage" == "true" )
    <mp3 name='testrace_invest' file='oetinvest/media/tr03_invest.mp3' button='Continue'>
#else
    <input type='submit' name='submit' value='Continue'>
#end
<p>

#parse("oetinvest/footer.vm")
